title: Bachelorette fans declare Timm Hanly as the favourite to win Angie Kent's heart
text:
Fans have declared Timm Hanly as the one to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.

Viewers took to Twitter to call the Melbourne-based fireproofer, 27, Angie's Mr Right following Wednesday's premiere episode.

One tweeted: 'That's it. Shows over. No finale needed. Timm for the win.'

'Shows over. No finale needed': Fans have declared fireproofer Timm Hanly, 27, as the favourite to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette after Wednesday's debut episode

'Everyone else can go home. Timm has this,' another wrote.

Someone else added: 'I'm calling it now, Tim is easily a front runner!'

'Tim is my favourite, I think I'm already in love with him,' another tweeted.

Is he Mr Right? After watching his first meeting with Angie on the red carpet, fans posted on Twitter: 'Everyone else can go home. Timm has this'. Someone else added: 'I'm calling it now, Tim is easily a front runner!'

On Wednesday, Timm impressed Angie, 29, with a large bouquet of sunflowers - a flower of significant meaning to the blonde beauty.

She explained: 'Sunflowers are actually my sign - so, if I see a sunflower, to me, that's a sign from my nanny that, like, I'm in the right place.

'And here we are in the right place,' he said.

Grand gesture: Timm impressed Angie with a large bouquet of sunflowers - a flower of significant meaning to the blonde beauty. She explained, 'If I see a sunflower, to me, that's a sign from my nanny that, like, I'm in the right place'

Angie later told producers: 'I am such a big believer in signs, and when he came down the path with sunflowers, out of all flowers, I was like, "Whoa."

She added: 'That [the sunflowers] was such an in your face sign from the universe, I kind of wanted to cry but I didn't want to freak Timm out.'

The Bachelorette continues Thursday on Channel 10 at 7.30pm
description: Fans have declared Timm Hanly as the one to win Angie Kent's heart on The Bachelorette.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
